title: Where are the headquarters of Cognizant Technology Solutions located? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cognizant is an American multinational corporation that provides IT services, including digital, technology, consulting, and operations services. It is headquartered in Teaneck, New Jersey, United States. However, Cognizant India manages the necessary operational services in India itself. The major employee base of the company lies in Chennai, Tamil Nadu.
